name: Paragon Pizza
description: Chain serving pizzas with a variety of toppings & sauces in a simple space.
address: Paragon Pizza, 6942 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3Y8

featured_reviews.review_id:
Yesterday night we ordered butter chicken pizza and creamy cheese pizza, these pizzas were amazing!

The chicken was tender, and that buttery sauce was something else. It had a bit of kick, but the creaminess balanced it perfectly. Unique and tasty - Creamy Cheese Pizza was a cheesy dream. Loads of cheese all over the place.

Thanks Paragon Pizza for satisfying our pizza cravings tonight! If you're looking for some seriously good slices, give them a try. You won't be disappointed!"
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: So, I just ordered my first pizza from Paragon Pizza today for lunch at my work place. It was awesome! I ordered a Butter Chicken Pizza, and added onion and tomato. There was a lovely little zing from the banana peppers in the background, but it was not overwhelming. It was too much food for me, so I offered some to my team coworkers, and their response was that it was very good, indeed. One of my coworkers had a second piece, and it was only a small pizza to begin with. Definitely a spectacular choice for pizza, so check it out!
featured_reviews.review_text: So, I just ordered my first pizza from Paragon Pizza today for lunch at my work place. It was awesome! I ordered a Butter Chicken Pizza, and added onion and tomato. featured_reviews.review_id: The crust here is nice as it tastes very homemade. The toppings could be a little more generous as the cheese layer and pizza sauce were both quite thin and the cheese pizza tasted more like a pizza breadstick or pizza bread bun.
featured_reviews.review_text: The crust here is nice as it tastes very homemade. The toppings could be a little more generous as the cheese layer and pizza sauce were both quite thin and the cheese pizza tasted more like a pizza breadstick or pizza bread bun.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Treated my family for pizza from Paragon the other day. I was drawn to promo deals via Door Dash and Best Eaters Combo ($39.99) seemed perfect for 9 of us.

I ordered Butter Chicken Pizza, Everything Special, chicken wings and bread stick. I didn't know bread sticks were substitution for additional wings for the order.

Food was pretty good. All my families were happy even nieces and nephew. Wings were very tasty too. One niece told me it was bit spicy, but everyone else liked it. The deal was unbeatable. Bread sticks were good too. I wish they had extra amount of wings in stock. Food was pretty memorable. I liked 2 free pops included in the combo.

featured_reviews.review_id: I love their pizza! Perhaps one of the best pizzas I had in Vancouver (pizzas are usually loaded).. Absolutely love them.. They do have deals and sometimes, I was lucky to get pop or mango lassi free with my pickup.. Folks, I highly recommend them
featured_reviews.review_text: I love their pizza! Perhaps one of the best pizzas I had in Vancouver (pizzas are usually loaded).. Absolutely love them.. They do have deals and sometimes, I was lucky to get pop or mango lassi free with my pickup.. Folks, I highly recommend them

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered house special pizza one hour before, and the young lady did so well it was really busy and she was working her self, but she still greeted amazingly. she was super fast and prepared the pizza in 12 minutes. I really appreciate I will definitely order next time from her or because their recipe is really good.
featured_reviews.review_text: I ordered house special pizza one hour before, and the young lady did so well it was really busy and she was working her self, but she still greeted amazingly. she was super fast and prepared the pizza in 12 minutes. I really appreciate I will definitely order next time from her or because their recipe is really good.

featured_reviews.review_id: This review is in regard the customer service; the food is good for the price. I like coming here everytime I can to show support for local business. But whenever I see the young and skinny lady at the counter watching the cellphone the whole time and not paying attention to what she is cashing out, I rather go to 7 eleven. The last time she wanted to charge me for 3 slices when I just had 1, fortunately I pointed it out and she put the correct amount. It is a good spot for pizza, I will still come on the days she is not working as she is really gloomy with a bad attitude for customer service.

featured_reviews.review_id: Best hospitality ever. I love the pizza. The pizza tastes so good. I want more. It is a must try for pizza lovers. The menu was well planned for veggies and meat lovers.
